org.symphonyoss.client.impl

Class SymphonyBasicClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.client.impl.SymphonyBasicClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SymphonyClient

    public class SymphonyBasicClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SymphonyClient
    Implements a full abstraction of underlying clients and exposes services to simplify functional collaboration elements. Although all clients are exposed, it's highly recommended to access core functions through services. You must init this class with valid key and session tokens with stored in a SymAuth object. Please note, that the SymAuth expires and must be updated periodically to maintain access to the Symphony network.
